name: In 2 years!!! To Sabaody
effect: [Activate Main] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal 1 Straw Hat Crew type Character Card and add it to your hand. Return the other cards in any order to the bottom of the deck. [Trigger] Activate this cards [Activate Main] effect.

name: Baroque Works
effect: [Activate Main] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal 1 Baroque Works type card other than (Baroque Works) and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Mr. 2 Bon Clay (Bentham)
effect: DON!! x1 [When Attacking] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal up to 1 Event card with Baroque Works in its type among them and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Nami
effect: [On Play] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal 1 Straw Hat Crew type card other than Nami and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Jewelry Bonney
effect: [Activate Main] (1 DON!!) Rest this Character: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal 1 Supernovas type card and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Buena Fiesta
effect: [On Play] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal 1 FILM type card other than Buena Fiesta and add it to your hand. Then, return the other cards to the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Buggy
effect: [On Play] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 Blue Impel Down type card other than Buggy and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Nami
effect: [On Play] / [When Attacking] (1 DON!!): Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 FILM type card other than Nami and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Charlotte Perospero
effect: [On KO] Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal 1 Big Mom Pirates type card and add it to your hand. Return the rest to the bottom of your deck in any order. [Trigger] You may discard 1 card from your hand: Play this card.

name: Nami
effect: [On Play] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck; reveal 1 green East Blue type card other than Nami and add it to your hand. Then, place the remaining cards at the bottom of the deck in any order. [Trigger] Play this card.

name: Buggy
effect: This Character cant be KOed in battle with Slash attribute Characters and Leaders. [On Play] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 Red Event card and add it to your hand. Place the rest of the cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Izou
effect: [On Play] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with Whitebeard Pirates in its types other than Izou and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Brannew
effect: [On Play] Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal 1 Navy type card other than Brannew and add it to your hand. Then trash the remaining cards.

name: Charlotte Pudding
effect: [On Play] Look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal 1 Big Mom Pirates type card other than Charlotte Pudding or 1 Sanji and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Striker
effect: [Activate Main] (2 DON!!) You may rest this Stage: If your Leader is Portgas D. Ace, look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest of the cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Spandam
effect: [On Play] Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with CP in its types other than Spandam and add it to your hand. Then trash the remaining cards.

name: Apis
effect: [On Play] You may trash 2 cards in your hand: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with the East Blue type and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Queen
effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the Animal Kingdom Pirates type, look at the top 7 cards of your deck, reveal up to 2 total Plague Rounds or Ice Oni and add them to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Ms. Valentine (Mikita)
effect: [On Play] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal 1 card with Baroque Works in one of its types and add it to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Trigger] DON!! -1: Play this card.

name: Off White
effect: [Counter] Give up to 1 of your Leader or Characters Power +4000 for this battle. Then, look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 Donquixote Pirates type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in your desired order.
traits: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
